statements: SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_price FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT customer_id, total_price FROM orders WHERE total_price > 100.00;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE product_id IN ('abc123', 'def456');
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 'xyz789';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_price DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_price FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 'a6f66c8b-9b5e-4de3-8fd5-e765864d29b7'
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_price) AS avg_price FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity >= 100
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5 AND total_price > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_name FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM orders INNER JOIN products ON orders.order_id = products.product_id WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 30 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE order_date > '2022-02-15';
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders LEFT JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT product_id, available_quantity, reorder_threshold FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity < reorder_threshold;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 AND order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, shipments.shipment_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id
